summary: Metalogic_v2 has FMP infrastructure but no constructive decidability; old Metalogic has complete tableau-based decidability (8 files, ~2100 lines) requiring porting via Task 607 before completing this task's completeness proofs.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of Metalogic_v2 vs old Metalogic decidability infrastructure, identifying 4 key sorries to resolve and recommending Task 607 as prerequisite

next_steps: Run /plan 490 to create implementation plan after Task 607 completes

key_findings: Metalogic_v2 has noncomputable FMP-based decidability only (Classical.dec)
Old Metalogic/Decidability has 8 complete files totaling ~2100 lines
4 sorries need resolution: expansion_decreases_measure, tableau_complete, decide_complete, decide_axiom_valid
Task 607 (Port Decidability to Metalogic_v2) is the critical prerequisite
Closure infrastructure exists in both; should use Metalogic_v2's version
Completeness proof is the main theoretical work (FMP provides termination bound)
